experiencinators.title: Experiencinators
experiencinators.description: Available Experiencinator items. The order of items in this list determines which one is used if there are multiple, with items later in the list being considered better.

conversion_rates.title: Conversion Rates
conversion_rates.description: A map from item region to a conversion name (see conversions further down).

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.description: Prerequisites to be able to use this experiencinator.

prerequisites_failure_message.title: Prerequisites failure message
prerequisites_failure_message.description: Error message that is sent to the player if they attempt to use a shift + left/right click shortcut with this experiencinator if they don't fulfill the required prerequisites.

conversions.title: Conversions
conversions.description: List of possible conversions (items to currency/tickets/etc.)

settings_id.title: Settings ID
settings_id.description: Digit used to store this setting in the scoreboard. Multiple conversions can have the same ID if they apply to different regions.

rates.title: Conversion Rates: map of item region -> conversion name -> item tier -> rate

results.title: Conversion Results
results.description: Map of region to list of conversion results

items.title: Conversion Results
items.description: Map of region to list of conversion results

value.title: Value
value.description: Value of this result. At least one result must have value 1. Results with value > 1 are used to give compressed result items if the total value of converted items allows (useful for currencies).

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of this result. Plural name if singular differs.

name_singular.title: Name (singular)
name_singular.description: Name of a single piece of this result, if different from the name.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: Loot table where this item can be found. Should be a loot table containing only a single item.

compress_existing_results.title: Compress Existing Results
compress_existing_results.description: When giving compressed result items, will also compress existing uncompressed result items in the player's inventory.

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.description: Prerequisites to be able to use this conversion.

tier_prerequisites.title: Tier Prerequisites
tier_prerequisites.description: A map from item tier to prerequisites to be able to convert items of that tier.

gui.title: GUI config
gui.description: Options for the in-game player settings GUI

region_icons.title: Region Icons
region_icons.description: A map from item region to an icon item for that region.

tier_icons.title: Tier Icons
tier_icons.description: A map from item tier to an icon item for that tier.

region_order.title: Region Order
region_order.description: Order of item regions in the GUI.

tier_order.title: Tier Order
tier_order.description: Order of item tiers in the GUI.

scoreboards.title: Scoreboard Config
scoreboards.description: Defines how player settings are stored

tier_order.title: Tier Order
tier_order.description: Order of item tiers in the decimal-packed scoreboard value. New tiers may be added to the end of the list. Note: If items are reordered, existing player settings will break!

objectives.title: Scoreboard Objectives
objectives.description: A map from item region to scoreboard objective where player settings will be stored for items of that region.
